articles.description: In theory, a new phone should work with Android Auto just fine, especially because it features the latest in terms of hardware and software.
articles.content: And the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE makes no exception, as this is one of the latest phones unveiled by the South Korean company, and its purpose is to serve as a more affordable alternative to the pricier… [+1497 chars]

articles.author: Adrian Potoroaca
articles.title: Facebook accuses Apple of using privacy as an excuse to abuse its dominant position - TechSpot
articles.description: Last month, a coalition of civil and human rights organizations including the Electronic Frontier Foundation, Amnesty International, and Human Rights Watch sent a letter to Apple CEO...
articles.content: The big picture: Apple said in a letter to privacy advocates that it's implementing 'app tracking transparency' in iOS 14 a little early to stop Facebook from collecting "as much data as possible" to… [+5508 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Thanks to Nvidia's cloud streaming platform, Fortnite is returning to iOS - PhoneArena
articles.description: While popular game Fortnite is no longer available from the App Store and iOS, it will soon be available via Nvidia's GeForce NOW cloud gaming platform using the Safari mobile browser.
